patthana17.6:1.1: Kusalaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana17.6:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.6:2.1_1: hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
patthana17.6:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.6:3.1_1: hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi
